name: Infinite road
description:
Infinite road is a very simple and easy to understand game, making it perfect for all ages and tastes, but with challenging difficult and the need of good reflexes to play it.
You move your character through an "infinite road" full of obstacles (in form of colums).
The obstacles on the path are generated randomly, that means that your videogame experience while playing this game will be different each time, and that also means, that sometimes you will find (while playing) very challenging situations needed of good and fast movements.
Enjoyable gameplay and lots of fun will be achieved while playing

What to expect:

-Good sound effects

-Best score is stored on the game and can be consulted

-Random generated scenario

-Enjoyable but difficult gameplay

-Easy to understand and play, you just need a mouse.


How to play:

Use your mouse to move on the menu and to move the road while playing.
